binary_levelset = np.random.uniform(size=10) < 0.5
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    mcubes.smooth(binary_levelset, method='constrained', max_iters=500,
        rel_tol=0.0001)
binary_levelset = np.random.uniform(size=(10, 10, 10, 10)) < 0.5
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    mcubes.smooth(binary_levelset, method='constrained', max_iters=500,
        rel_tol=0.0001)
